page.title: 09A Girl's Typical Day.
page.content: I get up at 8.10,get dressed,have breakfast,then wash.I have my hair plaited by my mother,get my lunch and go to school. I arrive at school at 8.45.When the bell goes we have assembly followed by mental arithmetic or language until break time.After play is over we have reading and mathematics,and once a week P.E. In the afternoon session we have art, craft or games or science and environmental studies and Religious Education.The last break of the day is usually followed by a Welsh lesson, then I go home. Sometimes before going home we go shopping,otherwise I go straight home for dinner.Some days I have ballet lessons and I sometimes go to tennis.I then watch T.V.At 7.30 I get a snack, then read until I am ready for bed.
